page.title: 10ENTERPRISE ZONES
page.content: Waterston and Honeyborough Industrial Estates are 2 of 13 which comprise the{Milford Haven Waterway {Enterprise Zone}all in various stages of development. The acronym{"EZ"}(easy) indicates the encouragement given to private- sector enterprises. This includes reduced bureaucracy by relaxing or speeding up the planning applications and also removing certain tax and rates burdens. The zones are designated for 10 years. {Waterston Industrial Estate}is sited opposite Gulf Oil Refinery and has 5 firms, 4 are plant hire and the 5th is construction engineering. At{Honeyborough}there are 13 firms ranging from Youth Enterprise to sheet metal, timber engineering, coal yard, television engineering and car sales. by Eileen Seal
